issue.title: Launching Image Display causes the Ignition GUI to shutdown

content.raw:
Unfortunately my computer needed to reboot before I saved off the console, and I am not having success searching ~/.ros/log for strings in the snippet above.  Is there somewhere else I should be looking for log files?  Or which log files would be useful without the console output above? Here is an example log directory - not sure it’s the one where the error occurred but the others just have more empty rostopic logs:

```
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser 42932 Jun 25 13:18 roslaunch-precision7530a-32032.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser 45799 Jun 25 13:18 master.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser 81415 Jun 25 13:18 roslaunch-precision7530a-32034.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser    95 Jun 25 13:18 tf_world_static-3-stdout.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser 11314 Jun 25 13:13 roslaunch-precision7530a-32033.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser     0 Jun 25 13:13 X1-pose_tf_broadcaster-7-stdout.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser     0 Jun 25 13:13 X1-ros1_ign_bridge_gpu_lidar-6-stdout.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser     0 Jun 25 13:13 X1-ros1_ign_bridge_camera-5-stdout.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser     0 Jun 25 13:13 X1-ros1_ign_bridge_twist-4-stdout.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser     0 Jun 25 13:13 X1-ros1_ign_bridge_actuators-3-stdout.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser     0 Jun 25 13:13 X1-ros1_ign_bridge_pose-2-stdout.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser     0 Jun 25 13:13 X1-ros1_ign_bridge_imu-1-stdout.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser   245 Jun 25 13:13 rosout.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser   154 Jun 25 13:13 rosout-1-stdout.log
-rw-r--r-- 1 snkitche mtriuser     0 Jun 25 13:13 ros1_ign_bridge_precision7530a_32032_457423275903048087-2-stdout.log
```

I have also not been able to reproduce the issue with Image Display since the reboot.

Is there somewhere else I should be looking for log files? Or which log files would be useful without the console output above?
